metadata.description: Hybrid tactics taxonomy combining MAPS-aligned execution framework with stakeholder persona intelligence and probabilistic success modeling for Medical Affairs Intelligence Platform
metadata.design_philosophy: Merge deterministic execution controls (v3.0) with stakeholder-centric tactical intelligence (v2.0) and probabilistic success modeling for both planning and simulation
design_principles: Region archetypes with bounded viability flags and cost modifiers
Stakeholder persona alignment with channel preferences
Probabilistic success modeling for resource optimization
Content modularity for reuse and efficiency

weighting_system.base_formula: final_effectiveness = base_effectiveness × stakeholder_alignment × regional_viability × resource_availability × evidence_quality × lifecycle_timing

cascade_contract.description: Defines how tactics receive constraints from pillars/stakeholders and propagate requirements to metrics/resources

pillar_tags_or_ids.mechanism: cascade.linked_pillar_ids filters tactics by strategic intent; tactics inherit pillar priorities

stakeholder_category_keys.mechanism: cascade.eligible_stakeholder_category_keys determines audience feasibility; stakeholder attributes drive persona_mapping

metric_ids_or_levels.mechanism: cascade.required_metric_levels bounds measurement; success_metrics define KPI tracking

channel_families.mechanism: maps_execution.channels determines delivery mechanisms; channel_viability impacts tactic effectiveness

tactics.name: Congress Symposium
tactics.description: Company-sponsored or society-aligned scientific symposium activity at key congresses, including satellite symposia planning, compliant scientific content development, and post-congress amplification.

stakeholder_persona_mapping.unmet_need_alignment: Practical interpretation of evidence and application to patient care
Scientific collaboration and visibility of the evidence base

success_probability_distribution.notes: Default prior for simulation; calibrate with client data and regional maturity.

failure_modes.mitigation: Early relationship building, differentiated value messaging

UK.regulatory_notes: EFPIA/ABPI-aligned transparency; member state / local code variability
UK.market_dynamics: NHS-centric; strong emphasis on NICE guidance alignment
tactical_adaptations: Emphasize health economics and NHS value
Align messaging with NICE technology appraisals

EU.regulatory_notes: EFPIA/ABPI-aligned transparency; member state / local code variability

Eastern_Europe.regulatory_notes: Variable regulatory frameworks; EU harmonization ongoing

governance.notes: Generated to complete tactic implementations; requires review and calibration.

tactics.name: HCP Education Program
tactics.description: Structured HCP education initiative (non-promotional), including accredited/non-accredited scientific education, speaker training, and learning journey measurement.

stakeholder_persona_mapping.unmet_need_alignment: Practical interpretation of evidence and application to patient care
Scientific collaboration and visibility of the evidence base

tactics.name: KOL Advisory Board
tactics.description: Structured gathering of key opinion leaders to provide strategic input on clinical development, market access strategy, publication planning, or medical affairs priorities

upstream_inputs: Strategic questions from medical affairs leadership

stakeholder_persona_mapping.unmet_need_alignment: Opportunity to shape strategic direction and influence practice standards

failure_modes.mitigation: Early invitations, calendar holds, make-up sessions
Thorough pre-meeting compliance review, documentation protocols

UK.regulatory_notes: ABPI code compliance critical; full transparency required
UK.market_dynamics: Strong KOL networks; NHS guidance influence

US.regulatory_notes: PhRMA code; Sunshine Act reporting mandatory

governance.notes: High-value, high-risk tactic requiring rigorous compliance oversight

tactics.name: MSL Field Engagement
tactics.description: One-on-one or small group scientific exchanges between Medical Science Liaisons (MSLs) and healthcare professionals to discuss clinical evidence, address medical information requests, and gather insights

stakeholder_persona_mapping.unmet_need_alignment: Access to latest clinical evidence and practical application guidance
Deep scientific discourse and collaboration opportunities

failure_modes.mitigation: Early relationship building, differentiated value messaging

UK.regulatory_notes: ABPI code compliance; high transparency requirements
UK.market_dynamics: NHS-centric; strong emphasis on NICE guidance alignment
tactical_adaptations: Emphasize health economics and NHS value
Align messaging with NICE technology appraisals

Eastern_Europe.regulatory_notes: Variable regulatory frameworks; EU harmonization ongoing

governance.notes: Core field medical tactic; requires continuous refinement based on market feedback

tactics.name: Omnichannel Digital Campaign
tactics.description: Coordinated digital omnichannel scientific engagement program (webinars, email, portal content, virtual scientific exchange), tailored by digital maturity and consent/privacy constraints.

stakeholder_persona_mapping.unmet_need_alignment: Practical interpretation of evidence and application to patient care

tactics.description: Scientific value dossier and evidence package for payer/HTA audiences, aligned to access questions and adapted by country requirements and evidentiary maturity.

tactics.name: Peer-Reviewed Publication
tactics.description: Original research articles, reviews, meta-analyses, or editorials published in peer-reviewed medical journals to disseminate clinical evidence and establish scientific credibility

stakeholder_persona_mapping.unmet_need_alignment: Establish scientific credibility and contribute to medical knowledge
Evidence-based practice guidelines and clinical decision support

success_metrics.note: Proportion published in top-tier target journals

failure_modes.mitigation: Tiered journal strategy, rapid resubmission plan
Clear timelines, project management, backup authors

UK.market_dynamics: High-impact journals accessible; KOL authorship valued
tactical_adaptations: Target BMJ, Lancet, NEJM where appropriate

EU.market_dynamics: Access to major European journals; language options

US.market_dynamics: Top-tier journal access; high impact potential

Eastern_Europe.market_dynamics: Regional journals; global journal access increasing

governance.notes: Core evidence dissemination tactic; requires long-term planning and author relationship management

tactics.name: Real-World Evidence Registry
tactics.description: Prospective or retrospective RWE registry program design and execution to generate evidence post-launch and support clinical practice understanding within compliant boundaries.

stakeholder_persona_mapping.unmet_need_alignment: Feasible data capture and partnership models for evidence generation

success_probability_distribution.notes: Default prior for simulation; calibrate with client data and regional maturity.

failure_modes.mitigation: Early relationship building, differentiated value messaging
